articles.title: Kyiv hopes to achieve peace with Russia through intermediaries - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Ukraine will not talk to Moscow directly, but hopes Putin’s friends will help to push him toward peace.
articles.content: We have a Ukrainian peace plan in front of us, and Russia has recently shared some terms. Each side sees the other party's steps as the extension of the war effort, Turkish Foreign Minister Hakan Fid… [+1390 chars]

articles.title: Vet bills: Owner quoted £500 to have hamster's teeth removed - BBC.com
articles.description: With costs rising sharply, one dog owner considered selling their home to pay a vet bill.
articles.content:
By Kayley Thomas, BBC News
One pet owner was quoted £450 to £500 for her hamsters teeth to be removed
When Danielle Amoss hamster Lyra was poorly, the first thing she did was speak to her vet.

articles.title: Scientists discover one of the biggest countries in the world is 'splitting in two - UNILAD
articles.description: A January 2024 study suggested that the tectonic plate beneath India - one of the world's biggest countries - was beginning to split into two
articles.content:
A study has suggested that the tectonic plate located beneath India's could be dividing into two.
India is the seventh largest country in the world, coming in behind the likes of Australia, Brazil a… [+2623 chars]
